content.rendered:
Cinder Volcano is a massive volcanic cave system that splits Route 4 in two parts. Passing through this volcano’s many chambers is required to get from Dresco Town to Route 5 and on to Crater Town. There are a variety of trainers and Pokémon here, as well as a Shadow presence during the main storyline.

Table of Contents

  • Cinder Volcano Maps
  • Item Locations
  • Wild Pokemon
    • Swarm Schedule – Vulpix
  • Trainers

Entrances and Exits from and within Cinder Volcano
(East Side) South: Route 4 East
Ladder Pair A: 1F East Side to 2F East Side
Ladder Pair B: 2F East Side to 3F East Side
Ladder Pair C: 3F East Side to 4F East Side
Ladder Pair D: 4F East Side to 3F Battle Girl Chamber
Ladder Pair E: 4F East Side to 5F Summit
Ladder Pair F: 5F Summit to 4F West Side
Ladder Pair G: 4F West Side to 3F West Side
Ladder Pair H: 3F West Side to 2F West Side
Ladder Pair I: 2F West Side to 1F West Side
(West Side) South: Route 4 West

Item Locations

Item Location Image
1F East Side
Rawst Berry (hidden)
In the north part of the chamber, south of the 2F ladder and the Heatran chamber passage
Zygarde Cell West of the 2F ladder and the Heatran chamber passage, near the lava pool
Rare Candy Through the Heatran passage and the outside exit, on a small balcony on an inaccessible part of Route 4 West
TM35 Flamethrower (requires Surf)
Across the small lava pool south of the 2F ladder
2F East Side
Revive (hidden)
Northwest of Collector Mark, hidden in a rock
3F East Side
Quick Ball (requires Rock Smash)
West side of the chamber across the north bridge, behind a smashable rock
Power Herb (hidden, requires Rock Climb)
West side of the chamber across the north bridge, up a rock climb wall in the northwest corner, hidden in a rock
4F East Side
Iron (hidden)
On the northeast island, north of the 3F D ladder, hidden in a rock
4F West Side
Calcium East of the 5F ladder on a lower ledge
Ether (hidden)
West of the 3F ladder, hidden in a rock
3F West Side
Zygarde Cell East of the 4F G ladder, near the northeast lava pool
TM94 Incinerate In the Battle Girl chamber accessed through the D ladder pair, next to the Battle Girl
Full Heal (requires Rock Smash)
In the Battle Girl chamber accessed through the D ladder pair, west of the ladder, behind a smashable rock
Fire Stone (requires Rock Smash)
In the Battle Girl chamber accessed through the D ladder pair, west of the ladder, behind a smashable rock
Scope Lens (requires Strength)
Across the bridge, behind the Strength boulder, next to Mega Trainer Yale
TM38 Fire Blast (requires Rock Climb)
In the Battle Girl chamber accessed through the D ladder pair, west of the ladder, down a rock climb wall
2F West Side
Dusk Ball Directly southeast of the 3F ladder
Lava Cookie (hidden)
Northeast of the Hiker and a Strength boulder, hidden in a rock
Red Shard (hidden)
In the southwest corner of the chamber, hidden in a tall rock
Burn Heal (requires Rock Smash)
In the south part of the peninsula, behind a smashable rock
Nugget (requires Rock Smash)
On the north arm of the forked peninsula, behind a smashable rock
Red Shard (requires Strength)
After solving the boulder puzzle, across on the northeast side near the tablet
Sun Stone (requires Strength)
After solving the boulder puzzle, across on the northeast side near the tablet, hidden in a rock
Charizite X (requires Strength and Raid Den access)
After solving the boulder puzzle, across on the northeast side, in the tablet chamber
Flame Orb (requires Surf)
On the southeast side of the chamber, only accessible via Surf
Magmarizer (requires Surf)
On the southeast side of the chamber, only accessible via Surf, in the southeast corner
1F West
Super Potion Near the 2F ladder
